name: SPEEDSHIFTERS
description:
SPEEDSHIFTERS is a procedural speed-based platformer that utilizes suction to increase your odds of survival. Suck up creatures to gain their abilities to help you progress!

Make sure the giant death machine doesn't catch you!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Vacuum

S - Screenshot

F10 - Fullscreen

*Wall jumping is a thing*
